content_position.info: Only works when text overlay on image
content_position.label: Content position

custom_icon.info: Use square image for best result.
custom_icon.label: Custom image

custom_svg.info: The SVG icon will be rendered at the pre-defined size.
custom_svg.label: Custom SVG

desktop_filter_and_sort_layout.label: Filter and sort layout on large screen

enable_contact.label: Show email address and phone number

enable_filter.info: To customize Filter, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)
enable_filter.label: Enable filter

enable_fit_image_to_container.label: Resize image to fit its container

enable_large_heading.info: Helpful when using this section as a hero section
enable_large_heading.label: Enable large heading

enable_pagination_mobile.label: Show paginations as number on mobile

extra_information_item.info: Hide item if heading is empty

header_contact_information.info: To display your contact information, link them in your Theme settings.

header_currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header_newsletter.info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

header_variant_selector.info: Variant selector always shows if available. You can configure variant options to display as swatches in theme settings.

header_rating.info: Blum allows product rating from various Shopify partner apps to be displayed on product-related touchpoints such as Product details, Product cards, Quick shop, etc. Add a product rating app to display.

height_for_mobile.info: Height is always set to 100% on mobile

height.info: Height will always set to 100% on phone
height.label: Height

icon_source.info: Select one of the three sources below to display as an icon
icon_source.label: Icon source

items_per_row_on_desktop_horizontal.label: Items per row on desktop (Horizontal toolbar)

items_per_row_on_desktop_tablet_landscap.label: Items per row on desktop & tablet landscape

items_per_row_on_desktop_vertical.label: Items per row on desktop (Vertical sidebar)

items_per_row_on_tablet_protraint.label: Items per row on tablet portrait

open_external_link.label: Open external link in a new tab

remove_padding.info: Not apply when using background image

section_height.info: Section will expand if content exceeded available area

selected_page.info: Contact forms in the selected page will not be displayed
selected_page.label: Selected page

show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay.  [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/vi/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)
show_dynamic_checkout_buttons.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons

show_quantity_selector.info: Set based on how likely your buyers select more than one item at a time to add to cart. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/featured-product/#Purchasing)
show_quantity_selector.label: Show quantity selector

show_stock_number.info: Basic stock information still shows without stock number.
show_stock_number.label: Show stock number

show_variant_swatches.info: Configure variant swatches in theme settings.
show_variant_swatches.label: Show variant swatches

size_guide_paragraph.content: Display information about product sizing which can support buyer's purchasing decision when selecting the right product option. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/dynamic-checkout)

new_in_date_limit.label: New in date limit
new_in_date_limit.info: Status 'New in' is applied to products created within the selected day range. Set to 0 for no limit.

custom_badge_heading.label: Custom badge
custom_badge_heading.info: Blum supports displaying custom badges in Product card. You can use custom badges to highlight product features such as 'Best Seller', 'Limited Edition', etc. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-product-card)

product_badge_heading.info: Set up stock status conditions in [Product information](/editor?context=theme&category=product%20information)

items_per_row_on_large_screen.label: Items per row on large screen

show_ranking.label: Show ranking badges on products
show_ranking.info: Ranking badges follow the product order above. Reorder to update.

product_rating_app.label: Product rating app
product_rating_app.info: Other apps may need extra steps for proper integration. Please contact the app owners for detailed support.

show_rating.label: Show rating
show_rating.info: Configure product rating in Theme settings > [Product information.](/editor?context=theme&category=product%20information)

header_direction_button.content: The Google Maps link needs to be filled for the button to show.

show_view_all.label: Show "View all" button if blog has more posts than being shown

show_description.info: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)
show_description.label: Show collection description

show_view_all_button.label: Show ‘View all' button to view all collections

value.info: Separate each value by a comma.
value.label: Value

heading.info: If none is set, collection title will be used.

enable_view_more.info: Appears if collection has more products than shown.

show_view_all.label: Show ‘View all' button if collection has more products than being shown

show_variant_swatches.info: Only shows if variant swatches is enabled

view_details_button_paragraph.content: Use this to direct users to the product page.

header_newsletter.info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing " [customer list.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header_payment_methods.info: To add a payment methods, go to your [payment settings](/admin/settings/payments)

paragraph_contact.content: To display your email address and phone number, link them in your theme settings.

paragraph_social.content: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

show_payment.info: Icons display based on your Shopify payment methods
show_payment.label: Show payment icons

show_follow_on_shop.label: Enable ‘Follow on Shop'
show_follow_on_shop.info: To let customers follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled.

heading.info: Enter a name to create a new menu item
heading.label: Menu item name

menu_item_name.info: Enter the name of the menu item you would like to apply this mega menu. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-header/#mega-menu)
menu_item_name.label: Menu item name

paragraph.content: Mega menu only works on large screens

collection.info: Show a list of product collections next to menu for better catalogue navigation
collection.label: Enable collection browsing

enable_drawer.label: Enable drawer menu on large screens

enable_sticky.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.
enable_sticky.label: Enable sticky header

logo_transparent.info: If no logo is set here it will use the default logo image instead

enable_highlighted_collections.info: Show a list of product collections next to menu for better catalogue navigation
enable_highlighted_collections.label: Enable highlighted collections

enable_view_all.label: Show 'View all' button to view all collections

banner_link.info: Link applies to the whole banner without button.

height.info: 70% and 100% screen height only work on large screens (mobile always set to 100% height).

items_per_row_on_desktop.label: Items per row on large screen

paragraph_first.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page's featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

paragraph_second.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: This content is from your blog post.

expand_all_filter.label: Expand all filter options by default

enable_more_button.info: Shorten description content when more than 150 characters
enable_more_button.label: Enable "Read more" button

paragraph.content: Shows available offline stores for the selected variant. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/local-methods/local-pickup)

product_cross_sell_second.content: In the upcoming version, manual selection within the block will no longer be available. The only method for product selection will be through the Search & Discovery app.  [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

product_cross_sell.content: To select complementary products, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)
product_cross_sell.name: Product cross sell

product.info: This function will be deprecated in the next version
product.label: Products

show_gift_card_recipient.info: Gift card products can optionally be sent direct to a recipient along with a personal message.
show_gift_card_recipient.label: Show recipient information form for gift card products

header_advanced_description.info: Shows richful content to show more about your products. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-product-template/#advanced-description)

purchasing_bar_position.info: Applies to screens that are wider than 458px
purchasing_bar_position.label: Position

show_sticky_purchasing_bar.label: Show sticky purchasing bar when scrolling down

header_direction_button.content: The Map address field will need to be filled for the directions link to show.

map_address.info: Google Maps will load this location
map_address.label: Address

paragraph_one.content: Subscribers added automatically to your "Email subscribers" customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

enable_popup.info: Once closed without submitting, the popup will not show again until the next visit.
enable_popup.label: Enable popup

when_to_show.info: After add to cart will trigger popup once visitors close the cart notification
when_to_show.label: When to show

paragraph_2.content: Show related products automatically based on product information and orders.

paragraph_second.content: To select related products for a specific one, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#related-products)

paragraph.content: Product recommendation show related products by default based on product information and orders.

description.info: Describe the slideshow for customers using screen readers.
description.label: Slideshow description

recommend_to_use_background_image.info: Recommend to use background image with the same ratio for all slides

slide_link.info: Link applies to the whole slide without button.
slide_link.label: Slide link

collapse_on_mobile.info: Make sure headings of timeline items are incorporated.
collapse_on_mobile.label: Collapse by default on mobile

banner_link.info: Link applies to the whole banner without button.

video_alt_text.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video)
video_alt_text.label: Video alt text

enable_parallax_scrolling_prominent_badg.label: Enable parallax scrolling for Prominent badge

optimize_page_performance.info: Reducing animation usage on first fold section to improve page performance
optimize_page_performance.label: Optimize page performance

show_excerpt.info: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)
show_excerpt.label: Show excerpt

minimum_order_price_for_free_shipping.info: Enter the minimum number based on order price that matches your free shipping rate. The free shipping amount displayed in the Cart will be automatically exchanged when the visitor switches currencies on the website. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/theme-settings-blum/#Cart)
minimum_order_price_for_free_shipping.label: Minimum order price for free shipping

show_free_shipping_notification.info: Encourage customers add more to cart to earn free shipping.
show_free_shipping_notification.label: Show free shipping notification

upgrade_version.info: In case you using Blum 2.0.0 by upgrading from an older version, you need to migrate the old color system to the new one. [Learn more](https://saleshunterthemes.com/pages/data-transfomer)

background_gradient.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.
background_gradient.label: Background gradient

header_accent.info: Applies to emphasized elements in the section

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
favicon.label: Favicon image

variant_swatches_option.info: Enter the variant label that you want to display as swatches
variant_swatches_option.label: Variant option

variant_swatches_rules.info: Format: <Variant option>: <value>(separated by lines). Example: Deep Purple: #7000AA Plastic: plastic.png
variant_swatches_rules.label: Variant swatches rules

variant_swatches.info: Blum supports single variant to display as swatches. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/blum-theme-settings/#variant-swatches-mechanism)
variant_swatches.label: Variant swatches

font_scale_level.info: Changing the font type scale will change the overall font size. [Learn more](https://docs.saleshunterthemes.com/manual/typography/)
font_scale_level.label: Font scale level

header_body_paragraph.content: Base text size will use as the base size to scale other element's font sizes

header_body.info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

countdown.info: Time zone will be taken from the shop settings and it can be managed from [here](/admin/settings/general).

end_date.info: Format: YYYY-MM-DD.  If end date is blank, the countdown will finish at midnight tonight.
end_date.label: End date

end_text.info: Display when the countdown ends. Hide if empty.
end_text.label: End text

hide_on_end.info: Once countdown ends, there's only banner displayed
hide_on_end.label: Hide the countdown when it ends
